name: Garten of Banban: Reincarnated
description:
Garten of Banban: Reincarnated is a fanmade game based on Garten of Banban.

This project was made in 1 week with ZERO game design knowledge, so expect it to be kind of janky. 

This is a fanmade project and video based on "Garten of Banban" by the Euphoric Brothers. This project was made purely for practice and fun and is not for profit. Please support the official releases of the Garten of Banban series.

IF THE EUPHORIC BROTHERS HAVE ANY ISSUE WITH THIS GAME BEING AVAILABLE FOR DOWNLOAD, OR MY VIDEOS ABOUT THE GAME, PLEASE SEND ME AN EMAIL OR MESSAGE ME ON TWITTER AND I WILL TAKE DOWN THE GAME IMMEDIATELY. THIS WAS PURELY A PASSION PROJECT FOR FUN, AND THE LAST THING I WANT TO DO IS UPSET THE ORIGINAL DEVELOPERS.
